TITLE.Text:
The Wayfarer – Dive into the Dunes

Begin your descent?

END_REFUSAL.Text: You step back. The Stranger fades. The dunes forget your name. The story ends before it begins.

START.Text:
You arrive at a DEAD END sign half-swallowed by the sand. But the sign is warm. Breathing.

Do you trust it?

STRANGER.Text:
A stranger stitched from starmaps waits in silence. He holds out a compass that bleeds ink.

He whispers, 'Give me something unknown.' You realize he means your soul.

HESITATE_1.Text:
The wind holds its breath. The stranger doesn't.
You are already his. There is no choice.

NODE_0000.Text: The dunes echo with footsteps that aren’t yours.

NODE_0001.Text: A tower made of obsidian tilts toward the stars.

NODE_0002.Text: You find a circle of salt surrounding nothing.

NODE_0003.Text: A shadow follows, one breath behind you.

NODE_0004.Text: The sky opens, revealing teeth not stars.

NODE_0005.Text: A shipwreck lies in the sand, sails flapping without wind.

NODE_0006.Text: A flame flickers inside a skeleton's ribcage.

NODE_0007.Text: Mirages speak your name in reverse.

NODE_0008.Text: A handprint smolders in the sky above.

NODE_0009.Text: You hear weeping beneath your own footsteps.
